overview:
As head of marketing at Intronis, Carol Ferrari is a major contributor to the company’s significant growth. Carol was recognized by Everything Channel’s CRN Magazine as one of the top Women of the Channel for 2011 and 2012.

Carol is a SaaS marketing veteran and joins Intronis from Salary.com. Previously, she worked at various sized public and private companies helping them to implement highly metrics-driven, repeatable and scalable marketing programs. Carol graduated from Rochester Institute of Technology with a bachelor’s degree in engineering and business, and received her MBA from the Illinois Institute of Technology.
